short_summary: PWGSC is issuing a Request for Standing Offer for repair services for lift truck batteries and other specialized equipment for Montreal, Saint-Jean and Farnham garrisons.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence is issuing this request for standing offers (RSO) for the acquisition of repair services for lift truck batteries and other specialized equipment for Montreal, Saint-Jean and Farnham garrisons, as detailed in Annex Statement of Work.
full_summary:
================================

### Title and Solicitation

**W0106-23JD08 - Lift Truck Battery and Specialized Equipment Repair Services Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)** 
**Demande d’offres à commandes (RFSO) pour les Services de réparation des trotoirs moteurs et Matériel spécialisé W0106-23JD08**

### Reference and Identification

Reference Number : WS4221612534
Amendment Number : 1
Solicitation Number : WS4221612534

### Tender Details

**Publication Date and Tender Closing Date**

The tender was published on 2023-09-20 and the tender closing date is *2023-11-07T14:00:00*.

**Contract Duration and End**

The expected contract start date is not specified, but the expected contract end date is 2025-10-30.

### Tender Status

The tender has *Expired* due to non-response from contractors.

### Procurement Details

*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Trade Agreements: *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*

### Tender Description

PWGSC on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking repair services for lift truck batteries and other specialized equipment for Montreal, Saint-Jean, and Farnham garrisons as detailed in the Annex Statement of Work.
